engalantha krikat kandayame shri lanka tharaga sancharaya 1981-82 - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya engalantha krikat kandayame shri lanka tharaga sancharaya 1981-82 (engalantha krikat kandayama 1981-82 di shri lankawe kala sancharaya wethin yali-yomu karana ladi) engalanthaya 1981–82 di shri lankawehi kala sancharaya dina wakawanuwa 17 pebarawari 1982 – 21 pebarawari 1982 nayakayan kith flechar bandula warnapura test tharagamalawa prathipalaya tharaga 1 -kin yuthu tharaga malawa 1–0 lesin engalanthaya jayagrahanaya kaleya wadima lakunu dewid gawar 131 royi dayas 77 wadima kadulu derik andarwud 8 asantha da mal 5 ek dina jathyanthara tharagamalawa prathipalaya tharaga 2-kin yuthu tharaga malawa 1–1 lesin engalanthaya jayagrahanaya kaleya wadima lakunu graham guch 138 sidath weththamuni 132 wadima kadulu iyan botham 4 asantha da mal 6 engalantha krikat kandayama, 1982 pebarawariyehidi shri lankawe sancharaya kalaha.

me siyalla, kithu dahame unnathiya wenuweni.indin, rijwe aarya lama rohala pasukara yana oba thal gas pelak wani wisal thuru pelak diswana me bhumiya desa mohothak nawathi balanu mana!oba wetha dath digu kara karunabarithawa bala hindina jesu samindunge ruwa oba nethu gatenu atha.wishesha sthuthiya - madhyama lekhanagaraya bhara pradhana piyathuman wana garu sikstas kurukulasuriya piyathumanta, gnyanartha pradipaya puwathpathe pradhana karthru shantha sagara garu piyathumanta saha paudgalika katholika pasal bhara adhyaksha ranjith madurawala garu piyathumata.inoka perera bandarachayarupa - sudam gunasinhakarthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
